title: The Highness Rajagiriya
details:
Address of the condominium:Rajagiriya
Apartment number & Floor:6 th floor
Bedrooms 3
Bathrooms 2
Sqft area 1384
Maid's room and bathroom:yes
Number of secured parking 2
Views city

Fully equipped gymnasium
Swimming pool and changing room
Common club house & roof top terrace
Parking slot allocated for each unit
Separate area is allocated for garbage collection on ground floor
2 passenger lifts shall be provided
Generator facility
24 hour security shall be provided
Visitors car parking Facility
